    • Method Detail

      • finish

        public void finish()

      • setupparameters

        public static void setupparameters()
        Called to set-up default parameters. You may call this method to "reset" and then provide your own before calling #generate(). This step is done in advance - otherwise the random generator will just naturally select "easy" parameters. This way parameters are "set" and the generator needs to rety as many times as necesar to achieve them.

      • generate

        public static DungeonGenerator generate(int minrooms,
                                        int maxrooms,
                                        Tables tables)
        Returns:
        A dungeon map, ready for drawing.
        See Also:
        VirtualMap.rooms, setupparameters()
